#include<bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
 
typedef unsigned long long ull;
typedef long long ll;
 
#define mod 1000000007
#define pi 3.141592653589793238462643383279502884197169399375105820974
#define LOGSZ 17
#define loop(i,a,b) for(ll i=a;i<b;i++)
#define all(c) (c).begin(),(c).end()
#define nl cout<<"\n"
#define sz(a) (long long)(a).size()
#define len(a) (long long)a.length()
#define pb push_back 
#define mp make_pair
#define in(a,b) ( (b).find(a) != (b).end() )
#define fill(a,v) memset(a, v, sizeof a)
 
typedef vector<ll> vi; 
typedef vector<vi> vvi; 
typedef pair<ll,ll> ii;
typedef pair<double,double> dd;
typedef vector<dd> vdd;
typedef vector<ii> vii;
typedef vector<vii> vvii;
typedef vector<double> vd;
typedef vector<vd> vvd;
 
ll gcd(ll a, ll b) { int temp; while(b > 0) { temp = a%b; a = b; b = temp; } return a; }
ll lcm(ll a, ll b) { return a/gcd(a,b)*b; }
ll modpow(ll a, ll n) { ll p = 1; while(n) { if (n%2) p = p*a%mod; n/=2; a = a*a%mod; } return p; }
ll length(ll n){
	if(n==1|| n==0) return 1;
	double t1 = log(2*pi) - 2*n +log(n)*(1+2*n);
	double t2 = 2*log(10);
	return ceil(t1/t2);
}
 
inline int two(int n) { return 1 << n; }
inline int test(int n, int b) { return (n>>b)&1; }
inline void set_bit(int & n, int b) { n |= two(b); }
inline void unset_bit(int & n, int b) { n &= ~two(b); }
inline int last_bit(int n) { return n & (-n); }
inline int getFirstSetBitPos(int n){return log2(n&-n)+1;}
inline void toggle(int & n,int b){n ^= 1 << b;}

int main(){
	ll t,n,m;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		cout<<length(n)<<endl;
	}
}
